statements: SELECT * FROM word_frequency;
SELECT document_id, word, frequency FROM word_frequency WHERE document_id = 1;
SELECT word, frequency FROM word_frequency WHERE frequency > 10;
SELECT * FROM word_frequency ORDER BY frequency DESC;
SELECT word, COUNT(*) AS frequency_count FROM word_frequency GROUP BY word;
SELECT * FROM word_frequency WHERE frequency > 10 ORDER BY word ASC;
SELECT document_id, SUM(frequency) AS total_freq FROM word_frequency GROUP BY document_id HAVING total_freq > 100 ORDER BY total_freq DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT word FROM word_frequency WHERE word LIKE '%ing%' ORDER BY word DESC;
SELECT document_id, COUNT(*) AS word_count FROM word_frequency GROUP BY document_id HAVING word_count >= 5 ORDER BY document_id;
SELECT MAX(frequency) AS max_freq, MIN(frequency) AS min_freq FROM word_frequency;
SELECT * FROM TextDocuments;
SELECT document_id, document_text FROM TextDocuments WHERE document_id = 1;
SELECT document_text FROM TextDocuments ORDER BY document_id DESC;
SELECT word_text, frequency FROM WordFrequency WHERE document_id = 2 ORDER BY frequency DESC;
SELECT word_text, COUNT(word_text) AS word_count FROM WordFrequency GROUP BY word_text HAVING word_count > 5;
SELECT * FROM TextDocuments;
SELECT document_id, document_text FROM TextDocuments WHERE document_id = 123;
SELECT document_text FROM TextDocuments ORDER BY document_id DESC;
SELECT document_id, COUNT(word_id) AS word_count FROM WordFrequency GROUP BY document_id HAVING word_count > 10;
SELECT document_id, word_text, frequency FROM WordFrequency WHERE frequency >= 5 ORDER BY frequency DESC, word_text ASC;
SELECT * FROM documents;
SELECT document_id, document_text FROM documents ORDER BY document_id DESC;
SELECT document_text FROM documents WHERE document_id = 3;
SELECT document_id, COUNT(word_id) AS word_count FROM word_frequencies GROUP BY document_id HAVING word_count > 10;

SELECT documents.document_id, documents.document_text, words.word_text FROM documents INNER JOIN word_frequencies ON documents.document_id = word_frequencies.document_id INNER JOIN words ON word_frequencies.word_id = words.word_id ORDER BY documents.document_id ASC, word_frequencies.frequency DESC;
SELECT * FROM documents WHERE document_id = 1;
SELECT document_id, document_text FROM documents WHERE document_text LIKE '%important%';
SELECT word_text, SUM(frequency) AS total_frequency FROM words w JOIN word_frequencies wf ON w.word_id = wf.word_id GROUP BY word_text;
SELECT document_id, COUNT(word_id) AS word_count FROM word_frequencies GROUP BY document_id ORDER BY word_count DESC;
SELECT d.document_id, w.word_text, wf.frequency FROM documents d JOIN word_frequencies wf ON d.document_id = wf.document_id JOIN words w ON wf.word_id = w.word_id WHERE wf.frequency > 5;
SELECT * FROM words_frequency
SELECT word, frequency FROM words_frequency WHERE document_id = 1
SELECT title, author FROM documents ORDER BY date_published DESC
SELECT name, nationality FROM authors WHERE birth_year < 1980
SELECT document_id, word, frequency FROM analysis_results
SELECT * FROM words_frequency WHERE frequency > 10 ORDER BY frequency DESC
SELECT title, author, date_published FROM documents WHERE author = 'John Doe'
SELECT author_id, name, birth_year FROM authors WHERE nationality = 'American' ORDER BY birth_year
SELECT document_id, word, frequency, analysis_date FROM analysis_results WHERE analysis_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT documents.title, words_frequency.frequency FROM documents JOIN words_frequency ON documents.document_id = words_frequency.document_id
SELECT * FROM documents;
SELECT title, content FROM documents WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, title, content FROM documents WHERE title LIKE '%example%';
SELECT id, title FROM documents ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT id, title, content FROM documents WHERE id BETWEEN 3 AND 5;
SELECT title, content FROM documents;
SELECT id, title, content FROM documents WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name FROM authors WHERE id = 1;
SELECT d.title, a.name FROM documents d JOIN document_authors da ON d.id = da.document_id JOIN authors a ON da.author_id = a.id;
SELECT w.word, w.frequency, d.title FROM words w JOIN documents d ON w.document_id = d.id WHERE w.frequency > 10;
